(1027) Sister White: In former years God blessed me as I went from place to place, preaching the Word. He gave me some 


                             -621- 

remarkable experiences in temperance work, near Boston, where I was permitted to address thousands of people. During these meetings when I spoke in response to the invitation of those not of our faith, I usually refused to accept any remuneration for such labor, so that they might not misinterpret my motives.
